title: Match Found! Confirmation Lag & Other Issues
body:
My problem is as follows:

Whenever I would select a queue to join in, whether it's Classic, ARAM, or the Weekend Game modes, it would progress normally. The timer would tick upwards to the estimate and... keep going. Then after a while a message box appears saying that I have been removed from the queue due to failure to accept the match. Sometimes it shows the match accept box, but it only appears for a second before it gives me the failed attempt prompt.

I repaired the client and it still didn't resolve my issue. I tried a clean install, and here where it gets wonky because whenever I launched the client after the install, it gave me the BSOD: Unexpected Kernel Mode Trap. After a while, I couldn't get it to even patch, but after a few random tries, it ended up patching successfully... but the problem persists. Help!

I don't even know where to begin to troubleshoot it!

replies.body:
From your description, it sounds like your client is not establishing a clear and stable connection to the PvP.net service, which could be causing your inability to accept queues and your long queue times. You can find a comprehensive list of steps that will address this problem in our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
